.signature-wave.background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.6), rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.6), rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.6), transparent)

0%.background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.6), rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.6), rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.6), transparent)

50%.background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.8), rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.8), rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.8), transparent)

100%.background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, rgba(236, 72, 153, 0.6), rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.6), rgba(139, 92, 246, 0.6), transparent)
